Description
Western Digital

We deliver the possibilities of data. YOU define
what’s possible.

We’re looking for a
talented and passionate engineer to join our Backend Software team. You will
design and implement new services and features of our core software that runs
on a multitude of servers and handles massive amounts of network traffic and
user data. This is a truly unique opportunity to learn what it takes to run a
highly optimized distributed service infrastructure and scale world-wide across
multiple data centers.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND
RESPONSIBILITIES:
  • Develop software that scales
    across thousands of machines and devices.
  • Work with our Product team to
    design new and compelling end user services and products.
  • Participate in code reviews and
    passionate technical discussions.
  • Develop unit and functional tests
    to validate your code
  • Provide technical leadership and
    mentorship for your peers

QUALIFICATIONS:
  • 3+ years of experience in writing great software.
  • Experience building, testing and optimizing
    large-scale distributed systems.
  • Experience working in a Linux-based environment.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
  • Experience working with Go, Cassandra, Kafka,
    Ceph, ElasticSearch, or Zookeeper
ABOUT WESTERN DIGITAL

Western Digital Corporation is the world’s largest data
storage company with a leading portfolio of HGST, SanDisk, G-Technology and WD
brands covering flash and disk-based solutions.
Deployed by the largest and most prominent organizations worldwide, Western
Digital solutions are everywhere, touching lives and enabling great value from
the data they possess.
